live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.
Technicians have been dispatched to resolve this issue as soon as possible.
29027.summary: Some customers in the Lake District area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
29027.title: Nov 13 - Edmonton (Lake District) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
